Class PotentialMove

  • java.lang.Object
    • PotentialMove

  • public class PotentialMove
extends java.lang.Object
    Stores a potential move for the Djikstra AI - storing first, and second moves, and the distances for each player after both moves have been made. The value is calculated as the opponent distance - AI distance, therefore high values are best for the AI and low values better for the opponent.
    Author:
    Steven Lowes

      • PotentialMove

        public PotentialMove(Coordinate firstMove,
                     Coordinate secondMove,
                     java.lang.Double aiDistance,
                     java.lang.Double oppDistance)
        Create a new PotentialMove and initalise all fields with the parameters passed.
        Parameters:
        firstMove - The first move to be made
        secondMove - The second move to be made (made by the Opponent)
        aiDistance - The distance for the AI once both moves are made
        oppDistance - The distance for the Opponent once both moves are made
